description:
Through an informed url, the plugin informs:

File type: (if it is PDF, PNG, JPG, GIF, provide a summary; if it is another type, provide the full mime type)

File size: if it is less than 1 kilobyte, inform it in bytes, if it is smaller than 1 megabyte, inform it in kilobytes, and if it is greater than or equal to 1 megabyte, inform it in megabytes.
name: Url - Get File Info
plugin_instructions:
To use the plugin:

- Add FileInfo element to the canvas.
- Enter the File URL in "File URL".
- Read the Content Type and Content Length information.
